<title level="1" right="Rules">[Unusual Group Sizes](/Rules.aspx?ID=908)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 33</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The standard group size for Pathfinder assumes four players and a GM. [Page 489 of the _Core Rulebook_](/Rules.aspx?ID=500) gives instructions for how to adjust for other group sizes, but additional changes may be helpful.
</column>
